wani aayathana, wiwidha siwil samaja sanwidhana ha thani pudgalayan wisin illa sitinne ewani nithigatha kirimak nowa brithanya yatath wijitha kolaniyak washayen pawathima hethuwen brithanyayan wisin apata labadena lada danda nithi sangrahaye 365 ha 365 a yana upa waganthi sanshodhanaya kara ho iwathkara wadihiti pudgalayan dedenakuge pudgalika kriyakarakamak aparadhayak lesa salakana wiktoriyanu nithiya wenas karana lesayi. 1883 di makale nam dadi muladharmawadi kristhiyani samiwaraya wisin ewakata silon lesa pawathi shri lankawe danda nithi sangrahaya sakas kala athara emagin ohu samalingika charyawan aparadhayak lesa salakimata awashya wana aakarayata waganthi sakas kaleya.
